# Getting Started

Welcome to the test documentation! This guide will help you get started quickly.

## Installation

To install the package, run the following command:

```bash
npm install test-package
```

## Quick Start

Here's a simple example to get you started:

```javascript
import { hello } from 'test-package';

hello('world');
```

## Next Steps

- Read the [API Reference](./api/core.md)
- Check out the [Authentication Guide](./guides/authentication.md)
